code: import axios from"axios";var base_url=process.env.REACT_APP_BASE_URL;export var doLogin=function doLogin(){return function(dispatch,getState){var dataUsername=getState().user.inputUsername;var dataPassword=getState().user.inputPassword;axios.get(base_url+"auth",{params:{username:dataUsername,password:dataPassword}}).then(function(response){dispatch({type:"LOGIN_SUCCESS",payload:response.data});}).catch(function(error){alert("Wrong username or password!");});};};export var changeInputUsername=function changeInputUsername(e){return{type:"CHANGE_USERNAME_INPUT",payload:e};};export var changeInputPassword=function changeInputPassword(e){return{type:"CHANGE_PASSWORD_INPUT",payload:e};};export var doSignOut=function doSignOut(){return{type:"LOGOUT_SUCCESS"};};
